entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 12:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:35 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:35 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:35 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
